context.liberation_movement: Polisario Front (Frente Popular de Liberacion de Saguia el Hamra y Rio de Oro)
key_features: The Moroccan Wall (Berm) - 2,700km fortified barrier built 1980-1987
Over 10 million landmines along the wall
Five refugee camps in Tindouf, Algeria housing ~175,000 Sahrawis
1991 UN-brokered ceasefire with promised referendum never held
